[[Image:Craig Parker.jpg: '''Craig Parker''' (born [[1970]]) played [[Haldir]] in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]] and [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
thumb: The Two Towers]]. He also provided the voices of [[Gothmog (Lieutenant of Morgul)
Craig Parker]]: Gothmog]] and his skull-helmed lieutenant in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

[[Image:Craig Parker.jpg: In June [[2007]], he and 14 other actors filed [http://us.imdb.com/news/ni0058227/ a lawsuit] against [[New Line Cinema]] over merchandising royalties.

thumb: The wigs were made from real human hair and so expensive. In the [[Battle of the Hornburg
Craig Parker]]: battle scene]] we all got them sweaty and dirty and covered in oil. My wig cost about $15,000 and the great worry was that I was going to ruin it.
